title: USA Baseball/News-Create a dynamic content header for each index
custom_preconds: As a fan, I want to know which News index I am viewing.
custom_expected:
-Content header dynamically displays $Team Name$ News

EX: USA Baseball News, 18 U National Team News

-Populated based on the slug of articles being pulled onto the page

title: USA Baseball/News-Add Back to Top button to Index
custom_preconds: As a fan, I want to quickly get back to the top of the USA Baseball News index I am viewing.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to URL: https://www.usabaseball.com/news/
2. Back to top button appears on page
3. Button initially appears once the 7th article comes into view
4. Once in view, the button is pinned to the bottom of the page: 50px from the bottom of the viewable area & 50px from the edge of the viewable area.
5. Clicking/tapping the button brings the user back to the top of the page
custom_expected:
-Back to top button appears on page
-Button initially appears once the 7th article comes into view
-Once in view, the button is pinned to the bottom of the page: 50px from the bottom of the viewable area & 50px from the edge of the viewable area.
-Clicking/tapping the button brings the user back to the top of the page

title: USA Baseball/News-Display messaging if there are no results in Index
custom_preconds: As a fan, I want to be alerted in some way that there isn't any content for the Month/Year combo I have selected on the News Archive.
custom_expected: -If no results available for a particular month + year, display messaging that reads: "There is no News to display for the time period selected".

title: USA Baseball/Articles-Page layout & behavior
custom_preconds: As a fan, I want to be able to see and read USA Baseball articles on any device.
custom_expected:
-XLarge-Large 1024+

-Page has a 2-column layout

In the main column:

-hero image

-Author, date; Social share links

-Line break

-Body of article

In the right column:

-300x250 ad slot

-More stories module with three (3) stories horizontally arranged

-Medium-Small 568-768

Page has a single-column layout

-Headline

-Hero image

-Author, date; Social share links

-Line break

-Body of article

-Line break

-300x250 ad

-More stories module with three (3) stories horizontally arranged

XSmall 567 and smaller:

-Page has a single-column layout

-Headline

-Hero image

-Author, date; Social share links

-Line break

-Body of article

-300x250 ad

-More stories module with three (3) stories vertically arranged

Refer to YES Zeplin for general layout direction

title: USA Baseball/News-Add date picker to page and functionality to index
